question: A family member is coming to staywith you. He/she will be arriving bytrain in the morning, but you won’t behome until the evening.Write a letter to your relative. In yourletter:explain arrangements you havemade for them to have keys andget into the house.tell your relative how to get fromthe train station to your house.say when you will be home andsuggest what you could dotogether that evening.
text: I get your letter last evening; you’re welcome to visit my place.

As you told me, you will reach the city railways station at 9’o clock on coming Saturday. Unfortunately, I have an extremely urgent meeting on that day at my office. So, I will be not available to pick you from the railway station. I am very sorry for it but I have arranged a taxi for you. A taxi driver will be reached at the station before time and he will call you.

My house address is 4588, ground floor, Sector 69. The main door will not be locked. When you will enter the main gate, just go sharp right and there will be one wooden box, you will be found the house keys inside that box. You also do not need to worry about your breakfast and lunch, I will order that online for you. In the evening, we will go to my maternal uncle house for dinner as they have invited us. You just be ready by 7PM .
I hope you don’t have any trouble reaching this place. In case you have any issue, you call on my office number 0172-2700054
